title: [Self-directed] Nonlinear Learning Design for Modern Pedagogical Shifts in Sports Coaching

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Concepts of Sports Coaching and Understanding of Traditional Pedagogical Methods
context.additional_context: Instructional design for microlearning environments accessible via smartphones by professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three limitations of traditional instructional methods in sports coaching.
Learners can apply the five core principles of nonlinear and individualized representative learning design.
Learners can generate feedback on real coaching scenarios using microlearning modules under three minutes in a mobile environment.

resources: Collaborative Tools with Real-Time Chat Functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
